node.title: JARV IS... - Beyond the Pale
node.description: JARV ISâ€¦ is Jarvis Cocker's new band project. against the original plan of only performing live and not releasing albums, they have taken live recordings and overdubbed them in the studio. They call it an "alive album", rather than a live one [src].
node.release: Beyond the Pale was released through Rough Trade on JuLy 17, 2020.
